{"id":1018187399,"question_id":2518,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1691735013,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1018187399/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"The Employee That Worked on the Longest Task","memory":"43.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int hardestWorker(int n, int[][] logs) {\n        int len = logs.length;\n        \n        int startTime = 0;\n        int max = 0;\n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        \n        for(int[] log : logs){\n            \n            int id= log[0];\n            int leaveTime = log[1];\n            \n            int workTime = leaveTime - startTime;\n            \n            // System.out.println(id + \" \" + workTime);\n            \n            if(workTime >= max){\n                \n                if(workTime!=max){\n                    list=new ArrayList<>();\n                }\n                \n                max = workTime;\n                list.add(id);\n            }\n            \n            startTime = leaveTime;\n        }\n        \n        Collections.sort(list);\n        \n        return list.get(0);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"the-employee-that-worked-on-the-longest-task","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
